original_text: And they took up Asahel, and buried him in the sepulchre of his father, which was in Bethlehem. And Joab and his men went all night, and they came to Hebron at break of day.
korean_text: 무리가 아사헬을 들어올려 베들레헴에 있는 그의 조상 묘에 장사하고 요압과 그의 부하들이 밤새도록 걸어서 헤브론에 이른 때에 날이 밝았더라

sentences.original_text: and buried him in the sepulchre of his father,
And Joab and his men went all night,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요압과 그의 부하들이 밤새도록 갔으며

sentences.original_text: and they came to Hebron at break of day.
